name: Polished Geek
tag_list: web-design, web-development, cms, joomla, joomla-cms, ecommerce, virtuemart, custom-php-development, joomla-extensions, extensions-for-joomla
overview:
Polished Geek is a boutique Joomla! Content Management System web design, custom development and extension company located in Raleigh, NC, USA.

Polished Geek was founded by a partnership of a certified Project Management Professional (PMP) with a background in business analysis and over 5 years experience as a Fortune 500 software consultant, and a software architect with over a decade of experience in IBM software engineering. The company brings a strong focus on business analysis and usability to web design and development. Complex Joomla integrations with external systems and processes are a strong focus for this company, as well as ecommerce customizations (for example, in 2011 Polished Geek developed the first Joomla to eBay integration and inventory synchronization application).

Polished Geek specializes in only Joomla! CMS:

1) Web Development & Web Design for SMB, nonprofits, individual, real estate and ecommerce websites;

2) Custom PHP Development of complete web applications and complex integrations with 3rd party applications, databases and systems;

3) Joomla extensions, including components, modules and plugins to extend Joomla CMS functionality, extend ecommerce features, or bridge multiple 3rd party extensions.

Expertise in customizing and integrating:

  • VirtueMart ecommerce, including shipping modules, payment modules, custom checkouts, business logic rules application during transactions, and more

  • multiple Joomla shopping carts and ecommerce

  • CiviCRM nonprofit advocacy software on Joomla

  • JomSocial social networking

  • SOBI2 and SOBI PRO

  • iProperty real estate extension and property management
